topic: Sampling Process Methodology and Evaluation Techniques

  entities:
    VQA|Method
    TIFA|Tool
    Sampling Process|Method

  proposition: Sampling process implements two diversity checks
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Sampling Process|IMPLEMENTS|diversity checks

  proposition: Similarity Checking prevents oversampling of identical elements
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Similarity Checking|PREVENTS|oversampling of identical elements

  proposition: Group Checking maintains distinction between different groups of elements
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Group Checking|MAINTAINS|distinction between different groups of elements

  proposition: Sampled data distribution is stored to enhance dataset diversity
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Sampled data distribution|ENHANCES|dataset diversity

  proposition: Evaluation uses VQA-based approach
    entity-entity relationships:
    Evaluation|USES|VQA

  proposition: TIFA is leveraged for atomic and interpretable evaluation
    entity-attribute relationships:
    TIFA|USED_FOR|atomic and interpretable evaluation

  proposition: Truthfulness is calculated sample-wise and averaged into final score
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Truthfulness|CALCULATED_AS|sample-wise average

  proposition: Evaluation assesses truthfulness within image generative models
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Evaluation|ASSESSES|truthfulness of image generative models

  proposition: Dynamic updating setting records element sampling frequency
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dynamic updating setting|RECORDS|element sampling frequency

  proposition: New samples are designed to avoid duplicating previous elements
    entity-attribute relationships:
    New samples|DESIGNED_TO|avoid duplicating previous elements

  proposition: Ensures caption diversity across real-world element distributions
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Sampling Process|ENSURES|caption diversity across real-world element distributions

topic: Truthfulness Scores for Text-to-Image Models

  entities:
    Dall-E-3|Model
    FLUX-1.1-Pro|Model
    SD-3.5-large|Model
    CogView-3-Plus|Model
    SD-3.5-large-turbo|Model
    HunyuanDiT|Model
    Playground-v2.5|Model
    Kolors|Model

  proposition: Dall-E-3 has a truthfulness score of 0.45
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dall-E-3|TRUTHFULNESS_SCORE|0.45

  proposition: FLUX-1.1-Pro has a truthfulness score of 0.36
    entity-attribute relationships:
    FLUX-1.1-Pro|TRUTHFULNESS_SCORE|0.36

  proposition: SD-3.5-large has a truthfulness score of 0.35
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SD-3.5-large|TRUTHFULNESS_SCORE|0.35

  proposition: CogView-3-Plus has a truthfulness score of 0.32
    entity-attribute relationships:
    CogView-3-Plus|TRUTHFULNESS_SCORE|0.32

  proposition: SD-3.5-large-turbo has a truthfulness score of 0.32
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SD-3.5-large-turbo|TRUTHFULNESS_SCORE|0.32

  proposition: HunyuanDiT has a truthfulness score of 0.31
    entity-attribute relationships:
    HunyuanDiT|TRUTHFULNESS_SCORE|0.31

  proposition: Playground-v2.5 has a truthfulness score of 0.30
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Playground-v2.5|TRUTHFULNESS_SCORE|0.30

  proposition: Kolors has a truthfulness score of 0.28
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Kolors|TRUTHFULNESS_SCORE|0.28

topic: Text-to-Image Models Challenges in Complex Scene Generation

  entities:
    T2I Models|Model

  proposition: T2I models struggle with generating complex scenes containing multiple objects
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2I Models|STRUGGLES_WITH|generating complex scenes with multiple objects

  proposition: Models demonstrate strong aesthetic achievement and internal stylistic coherence
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2I Models|DEMONSTRATES|strong aesthetic achievement
    T2I Models|DEMONSTRATES|internal stylistic coherence

  proposition: Models encounter significant challenges in organizing spatial relationships between objects
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2I Models|CHALLENGES|organizing spatial relationships between objects

  proposition: Objects are often placed without meaningful connection
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Objects|PLACED_WITHOUT|meaningful connection

  proposition: Models tend to focus on primary objects during image generation
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2I Models|FOCUSES_ON|primary objects during image generation

  proposition: Inadequate rendering of secondary elements compromises overall truthfulness
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Secondary elements|RENDERED_AS|inadequate
    Inadequate rendering|COMPROMISES|overall truthfulness

topic: Safety Challenges in Text-to-Image Models

  entities:
    T2I Models|Model
    Safety Research|Research Field

  proposition: T2I models have strong image generation capacity
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2I Models|DEMONSTRATES|strong image generation capacity

  proposition: Models are prone to producing harmful content
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2I Models|PRONE_TO|producing harmful content

  proposition: Training datasets may contain toxic content
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Training datasets|MAY_CONTAIN|toxic content

  proposition: Models can generate discriminatory images targeting specific groups
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2I Models|CAN_GENERATE|discriminatory images

  proposition: Safety research explores multiple threat vectors
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Safety Research|EXPLORES|multiple threat vectors

  proposition: Threat vectors include jailbreak attacks, backdoor attacks, inversion attacks
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Threat vectors|INCLUDE|jailbreak attacks
    Threat vectors|INCLUDE|backdoor attacks
    Threat vectors|INCLUDE|inversion attacks

  proposition: Researchers develop frameworks to evaluate and mitigate safety risks
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Researchers|DEVELOP|frameworks to evaluate safety risks
    Researchers|DEVELOP|frameworks to mitigate safety risks

topic: Safety Evaluation Dimensions

  entities:
    Safety Evaluation|Method

  proposition: Safety evaluation covers multiple dimensions
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Safety Evaluation|COVERS|multiple dimensions

  proposition: Dimensions include NSFW keywords, topics, self-harm, sexual content
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Safety Evaluation|INCLUDES|NSFW keywords
    Safety Evaluation|INCLUDES|topics
    Safety Evaluation|INCLUDES|self-harm
    Safety Evaluation|INCLUDES|sexual content

  proposition: Evaluation also covers gore, violence, hate speech, drugs, illegal activities
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Safety Evaluation|COVERS|gore
    Safety Evaluation|COVERS|violence
    Safety Evaluation|COVERS|hate speech
    Safety Evaluation|COVERS|drugs
    Safety Evaluation|COVERS|illegal activities

  proposition: Robustness testing includes perturbations like spelling mistakes and emoji insertion
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Robustness testing|INCLUDES|spelling mistakes
    Robustness testing|INCLUDES|emoji insertion

  proposition: Fairness assessment involves entity fuzzification and syntactic disruptions
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Fairness assessment|INVOLVES|entity fuzzification
    Fairness assessment|INVOLVES|syntactic disruptions

  proposition: Privacy evaluation examines individual and social tagging aspects
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Privacy evaluation|EXAMINES|individual tagging aspects
    Privacy evaluation|EXAMINES|social tagging aspects
